name: Farming Territory
description:
2 player 1v1 game where you have a small, farm area where you can plant 5 different types of vegetables. Each plant has 3 cycles to them, when it reaches the third cycle, then it is ready to collect. Each vegetable has different growth times and has a different amount of money that is received when collecting them. There are also 5 different farm animals that you can purchase that will give you a multiplier on how much money is earned from collecting the crops. The goal is to buy up as many vacant plots of land as possible before your opponent.

Single-player mode and vs AI mode are included as well.

Keyboard and PS4/Xbox controllers supported. *Only PS4 controller was tested. Wireless connection may not work, use a wired connection* 

If your game is running slow, try turning on Performance mode in the settings.

Made by Edwin Aguirre and in collaboration with Bryan Castaneda, Minsung Lee.
